00031         double TSPrnd(int low,double uper) //generate random number
00032         {
00033                 double p=(rand()/(double)RAND_MAX)*((uper)-(low))+(low);
00034 
00035                 return (p);
00036         }
00037         int rnd(int uper)
00038         {
00039                 return (rand()%uper);
00040         }

00072         void TSPAnt::move2last()
00073         {
00074                 int i;
00075                 for(i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00076                         if (AllowedCity[i]==1)
00077                         {
00078                                 addcity(i);
00079                                 break;
00080                         }
00081         }

00083         void TSPAnt::Clear()
00084         {
00085                 m_dLength=0;
00086                 int i;
00087                 for(i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00088                 {
00089                         prob[i]=0;
00090                         AllowedCity[i]=1;
00091                 }
00092                 i=tabu[iCityCount-1];
00093                 m_iCityCount=0;
00094                 addcity(i);
00095         }

00097         TSPAnt::TSPAnt()
00098         {
00099                 m_dLength=m_dShortest=0;
00100                 m_iCityCount=0;
00101                 int i;
00102                 for(i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00103                 {
00104                         AllowedCity[i]=1;
00105                         prob[i]=0;

00108         void TSPAnt::addcity(int city)
00109         {
00110                 //add city to tabu;
00111                 tabu[m_iCityCount]=city;
00112                 m_iCityCount++;
00113                 AllowedCity[city]=0;
00114         }
00115         int TSPAnt::ChooseNextCity()
00116         {
00117                 //Update the probability of path selection
00118                 //select a path from tabu[m_iCityCount-1] to next
00119 
00120 
00121                 int i;
00122                 int j=10000;
00123                 double temp=0;
00124                 int curCity=tabu[m_iCityCount-1];
00125                 for (i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00126                 {
00127                         if((AllowedCity[i]==1))
00128                         {
00129                                 temp+=pow((1.0/Map.distance[curCity][i]),beta)*pow((Map.m_dTrial[curCity][i]),alpha);
00130                         }
00131                 }
00132                 double sel=0;
00133                 for (i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00134                 {
00135                         if((AllowedCity[i]==1))
00136                         {
00137                                 prob[i]=pow((1.0/Map.distance[curCity][i]),beta)*pow((Map.m_dTrial[curCity][i]),alpha)/temp;
00138                                 sel+=prob[i];
00139                         }
00140                         else
00141                                 prob[i]=0;
00142                 }
00143                 double mRate=TSPrnd(0,sel);
00144                 double mSelect=0;
00145 
00146                 for ( i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00147                 {
00148                         if((AllowedCity[i]==1))
00149                                 mSelect+=prob[i] ;
00150                         if (mSelect>=mRate) {j=i;break;}
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 if (j==10000)
00154                 {
00155                         temp=-1;
00156                         for (i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00157                         {
00158                                 if((AllowedCity[i]==1))
00159                                         if (temp<pow((1.0/Map.distance[curCity][i]),beta)*pow((Map.m_dTrial[curCity][i]),alpha))
00160                                         {
00161                                                 temp=pow((1.0/Map.distance[curCity][i]),beta)*pow((Map.m_dTrial[curCity][i]),alpha);
00162                                                 j=i;
00163                                         }
00164                         }
00165                 }
00166 
00167                 return j;
00168 
00169         }
00170         void TSPAnt::UpdateResult()
00171         {
00172                 // Update the length of tour
00173                 int i;
00174                 for(i=0;i<iCityCount-1;i++)
00175                         m_dLength+=Map.distance[tabu[i]][tabu[i+1]];
00176                 m_dLength+=Map.distance[tabu[iCityCount-1]][tabu[0]];
00177         }
00178         void TSPAnt::move()
00179         {
00180                 //the ant move to next town and add town ID to tabu.
00181                 int j;
00182                 j=ChooseNextCity();
00183                 addcity(j);
00184         }
00185         class TSPDriver
00186         {
00187         public:
00188 
00189                 void UpdateTrial();
00190                 double m_dLength;// max 10^9
00191                 void initmap();
00192                 TSPAnt ants[iAntCount];

00199         void TSPDriver::UpdateTrial()
00200         {
00201                 int i;
00202                 int j;
00203 
00204                 for(i=0;i<iAntCount;i++)
00205                 {
00206                         for (j=0;j<iCityCount-1;j++)
00207                         {
00208                                 Map.m_dDeltTrial[ants[i].tabu[j]][ants[i].tabu[j+1]]+=Q/ants[i].m_dLength ;
00209                                 Map.m_dDeltTrial[ants[i].tabu[j+1]][ants[i].tabu[j]]+=Q/ants[i].m_dLength;
00210                         }
00211                         Map.m_dDeltTrial[ants[i].tabu[iCityCount-1]][ants[i].tabu[0]]+=Q/ants[i].m_dLength;
00212                         Map.m_dDeltTrial[ants[i].tabu[0]][ants[i].tabu[iCityCount-1]]+=Q/ants[i].m_dLength;
00213                 }
00214                 for (i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00215                 {
00216                         for (j=0;j<iCityCount;j++)
00217                         {
00218                                 Map.m_dTrial[i][j]=(rou*Map.m_dTrial[i][j]+Map.m_dDeltTrial[i][j] );
00219                                 Map.m_dDeltTrial[i][j]=0;
00220                         }
00221 
00222                 }
00223 
00224 
00225         }
00226         void TSPDriver::initmap()
00227         {
00228                 int i;
00229                 int j;
00230                 for(i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00231                         for (j=0;j<iCityCount;j++)
00232                         {
00233 
00234                                 Map.m_dTrial[i][j]=1;
00235                                 Map.m_dDeltTrial[i][j]=0;
00236                         }
00237         }

00272         //initial map, read map information from coming vectors.
00273         TSPDriver::TSPDriver(mrpt::aligned_containers<mrpt::poses::CPoint2D>::vector_t & toVisit)
00274         {
00275 
00276                 initmap();
00277                 m_dLength=10e9;
00278 
00279 
00280                 struct city
00281                 {
00282                         int num;
00283                         int x;
00284                         int y;
00285                 }cc[iCityCount];
00286 
00287                 for (int i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00288                 {
00289                         cc[i].num = i+1;
00290                         cc[i].x = toVisit[i].m_coords[LAT];
00291                         cc[i].y = toVisit[i].m_coords[LON];
00292                         besttour[i]=0;
00293                 }
00294                 int j;
00295                 for(int i=0;i<iCityCount;i++)
00296                         for (j=0;j<iCityCount;j++)
00297                         {
00298                                 {
00299                                         //Map.distance[i][j]=sqrt(pow((cc[i].x-cc[j].x),2)+pow((cc[i].y-cc[j].y),2));
00300                                         Map.distance[i][j]=getDistance(cc[i].x, cc[i].y, cc[j].x, cc[j].y);
00301                                 }
00302                         }
00303 
00304 
00305         }

00307         void TSPDriver::GetAnt()
00308         {
00309                 //randomly put ant into map
00310                 int i=0;
00311                 int city;
00312                 srand( (unsigned)time( NULL ) +rand());
00313                 for (i=0;i<iAntCount;i++)
00314                 {
00315                         city=rnd(iCityCount);
00316                         ants[i].addcity(city);
00317                 }
00318 
00319         }

00322         void TSPDriver::StartSearch()
00323         {
00324                 //begin to find best solution
00325                 int max=0;//every ant tours times
00326                 int i;
00327                 int j;
00328                 double temp;
00329                 int temptour[iCityCount];
00330                 while (max<iItCount)
00331                 {
00332                         for(j=0;j<iAntCount;j++)
00333 
00334                         {
00335                                 for (i=0;i<iCityCount-1;i++)
00336                                         ants[j].move();
00337                         }
00338 
00339                         for(j=0;j<iAntCount;j++)
00340                         {
00341                                 ants[j].move2last();
00342                                 ants[j].UpdateResult ();
00343                         }
00344 
00345                         //find out the best solution of the step and put it into temp
00346                         int t;
00347                         temp=ants[0].m_dLength;
00348                         for (t=0;t<iCityCount;t++)
00349                                 temptour[t]=ants[0].tabu[t];
00350                         for(j=0;j<iAntCount;j++)
00351                         {
00352                                 if (temp>ants[j].m_dLength) {
00353                                         temp=ants[j].m_dLength;
00354                                         for ( t=0;t<iCityCount;t++)
00355                                                 temptour[t]=ants[j].tabu[t];
00356                                 }
00357 
00358                         }
00359 
00360                         if(temp<m_dLength){
00361                                 m_dLength=temp;
00362                                 for ( t=0;t<iCityCount;t++)
00363                                         besttour[t]=temptour[t];
00364                         }
00365                         //printf("%d : %f\n",max,m_dLength);
00366                         UpdateTrial();
00367 
00368                         for(j=0;j<iAntCount;j++)
00369                                 ants[j].Clear();
00370 
00371                         max++;
00372 
00373                 }
00374                 /*
00375                 printf("The shortest toure is : %f\n",m_dLength);
00376 
00377                 for ( int t=0;t<iCityCount;t++)
00378                         printf(" %d ",besttour[t]);
00379                 */
00380         }

00382         double TSPDriver::getDistance( double lat1, double lon1, double lat2, double lon2 ) {
00383                                 const double EARTH_RADIUS_AVERAGE = 6371009;//average earth radius in meters
00384 
00385                                 double deltalat = lat2 - lat1;
00386                                 double deltalon = lon2 - lon1;
00387 
00388                                 //convert from degree to radian
00389                                 deltalat *= M_PI/180.0;
00390                                 deltalon *= M_PI/180.0;
00391                                 lat1 *= M_PI/180.0;
00392                                 lat2 *= M_PI/180.0;
00393 
00394                                 //nasty spherical trig stuff
00395                                 double a = pow( sin( deltalat / 2 ), 2 ) +
00396                                                 cos(lat1) * cos(lat2) * pow( sin( deltalon / 2 ), 2 );
00397                                 double c = 2 * atan2( sqrt(a), sqrt(1-a) );
00398 
00399                                 return EARTH_RADIUS_AVERAGE * c;
00400                         }
